parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates a link to the section of diary given by subject. Record is selected based on given unit/object, diary record or task. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''createDiaryLink''' [subject, record, text] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [subject, record, text]: [[Array]] -  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> subject: [[String]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> record: [[Object]], [[Task]] or [[Diary Record]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> text: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] - empty string <tt>""</tt> or string in <tt>[[format]] ["<log subject<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>""%1"" record<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>""%2"">%3</log>", subject, processedRecordId, text]</tt> </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_link <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[createDiarySubject]] ["Group", [[player]], "Player"]</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>diaryRec1 = [[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["diary", ["Record 1", "We can't refer to next record (("]];
diaryRec2 = [[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["diary", ["Record 2", "Go to " + ([[createDiaryLink]] ["Diary", diaryRec1, "record 1"])]]; 
diaryRec3 = [[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["diary", ["Record 3", "Go to " + ([[createDiaryLink]] ["Diary", diaryRec2, "record 2"])]];
</code>
</value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>funcProcessDiaryLink = {
    [[processDiaryLink]] [[createDiaryLink]] ["diary", _this, ""];
};
diaryRec1 = [[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["diary", ["Record 1", 
    "In this example, we can go to any next record: go to <execute expression='diaryRec2 call funcProcessDiaryLink'>Record 2</execute>"
]];
diaryRec2 = [[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["diary", ["Record 2", 
    "Go to <execute expression='diaryRec3 call funcProcessDiaryLink'>Record 3</execute>"
]];
diaryRec3 = [[player]] [[createDiaryRecord]] ["diary", ["Record 3", 
    "Go to <execute expression='diaryRec1 call funcProcessDiaryLink'>Record 1</execute>"
]];
</code>
</value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>


____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[processDiaryLink]], [[createDiaryRecord]], [[createDiarySubject]], [[diarySubjectExists]] [[setDiaryRecordText]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
